metas.name: Dark (2017)
metas.description: A mind-bending German sci-fi mystery with time travel, family secrets, and a very dark tone, similar to 'Stranger Things' but more complex and philosophical.

metas.name: Chernobyl (2019)
metas.description: A gripping historical drama about the Chernobyl disaster, showcasing the human cost of negligence and the bravery of those who risked their lives. Very intense and realistic.

metas.name: From (2022)
metas.description: A horror series about a town that traps everyone who enters. As residents struggle to keep a sense of normalcy, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest, which include terrifying creatures that come out after dark.
